mapper.select: select food_id foodId, food_name foodName, food_price foodPrice, plate_id plateId, store_id storeId, food_status foodStatus from food where store_id=#{storeId} and food_status=#{status}

select food_id foodId, food_name foodName, food_price foodPrice, store_id storeId, plate_id plateId from food where food_id = #{foodId}
mapper.insert: insert into food (food_id, food_name, food_price, store_id, plate_id,food_status) values (#{food.foodId},#{food.foodName},#{food.foodPrice},#{food.storeId},#{food.plateId},#{food.foodStatus});
mapper.update: update food set food_name=#{food.foodName}, food_price=#{food.foodPrice}, store_id=#{food.storeId}, plate_id=#{food.plateId} where food_id=#{foodId};
